item.title: FUEL SCAVENGE PUMP (ELECTRIC) – CENTER TANK WITH FUEL

remarks.para: May be inoperative deactivated provided the first 3,000 lbs (1360 kg) of center tank fuel is included as part of Zero Fuel Weight and is considered unusable.

note.para: If fuel is loaded in the center tank, the first 3,000 lbs of fuel loaded in the center tank is considered unusable, must be considered as payload, and must be accounted for during flight planning and for weight and balance calculations.
The EICAS status message FUEL SCAV PUMP will be displayed and latched when the fuel scavenge pump is commanded on.
The EICAS advisory message >SCAV PUMP ON may be displayed on the ground (due to failure of the pump low pressure indicating switch S314).

placard.para: Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "SCAVENGE PUMP INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Deactivate the inoperative pump by opening and collaring the SCAV PUMP circuit breaker located on the P414 panel (row M2).
